title: Enterprise Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics platform for monitoring business metrics and KPIs across multiple data sources.
longDescription: Led the development of a comprehensive analytics dashboard that aggregates data from multiple sources and provides real-time insights to business stakeholders. The platform features customizable widgets, advanced filtering, and automated report generation. Implemented using React, TypeScript, and AWS services with a focus on performance and scalability.

title: Customer Portal Redesign
description: Complete redesign and modernization of customer-facing portal serving over 500K users.
longDescription: Spearheaded the complete redesign of the customer portal, migrating from a legacy jQuery application to a modern React-based SPA. Implemented new features including real-time notifications, advanced search, and personalized dashboards. The project resulted in a 45% improvement in page load times and a 30% increase in user engagement metrics.

title: Real-Time Collaboration Platform
description: WebSocket-based collaboration tool enabling real-time document editing and team communication.
longDescription: Built a real-time collaboration platform from the ground up, featuring live document editing, instant messaging, and video conferencing integration. Implemented operational transformation algorithms for conflict-free collaborative editing. The platform successfully handled 10K concurrent users with sub-100ms latency.

title: E-commerce Payment Integration
description: Secure payment processing system integrated with multiple payment gateways.
longDescription: Developed a robust payment processing system supporting multiple payment methods and gateways including Stripe, PayPal, and Apple Pay. Implemented PCI-compliant security measures, fraud detection, and automated reconciliation. The system processes over $1M in transactions monthly with 99.9% uptime.
